holdout.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a person or organization that does not follow the generally accepted way of doing something
holdout.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The area is one of the last great holdouts in the Northeast against suburban shopping malls.
holdout.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a CREDITOR (=a person or organization to whom money is owed) that refuses the official plan to reorganize a bankrupt company
holdout.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: With its reorganization plan approved by creditors representing two-thirds or more of its debt, holdouts are obliged by court order to go along with the plan.
